name: Amexio D3-chart bar-stack
description: An  D3-chart bar-stack  chart that is rendered within the browser using SVG .Displays tips when hovering over points.

properties.name: legend
properties.description: Sets legend to D3 bar-stack chart

properties.name: color
properties.description: Sets color to D3 Bar chart

properties.name: http-method
properties.description: Type of HTTP call, POST,GET etc.

properties.name: data-reader
properties.description: Key in JSON Datasource for records.

properties.name: level
properties.description: Sets level for chart when drillable property used

properties.name: target
properties.description: Sets  target for chart when drillable property used

properties.name: drillable-data
properties.description: Arrays of keys provided for chart, when drillable property used.

legend.name: onLegendClick()
legend.description: It will fire only on click on Legend Click in D3 bar-stack chart .

chartevent.name: onChartClick()
chartevent.description: It will fire only on click on chart in D3 barstack chart .
